Package yacx

Class Kernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • yacx.JNIHandle
      • yacx.Kernel
  • public class Kernel
extends JNIHandle
    Class to help launch and configure a CUDA kernel.

      • configure

        public Kernel configure​(int grid0,
                        int grid1,
                        int grid2,
                        int block0,
                        int block1,
                        int block2)
        Configure the kernel.
        Parameters:
        grid0 - number of grids in first dimension
        grid1 - number of grids in second dimension
        grid2 - number of grids in third dimension
        block0 - number of blocks in first dimension
        block1 - number of blocks in second dimension
        block2 - number of blocks in third dimension
        Returns:
        this

                        int block2,
                        long shared)
        Configure the kernel.
        Parameters:
        grid0 - number of grids in first dimension
        grid1 - number of grids in second dimension
        grid2 - number of grids in third dimension
        block0 - number of blocks in first dimension
        block1 - number of blocks in second dimension
        block2 - number of blocks in third dimension
        shared - amount of dynamic shared memory in bytes
        Returns:
        this

      • launch

        public KernelTime launch​(KernelArg... args)
        Launch the kernel.
        Before the kernel can be launched the kernel must be configured.
        Parameters:
        args - KernelArgs
        Returns:
        KernelTime for the Execution of this Kernel
